# Spatial Data Analysis

## What exactly is Spatial Data Analysis?

<div class="indented2">
- using location or spatial relationships as an **explanatory** or **predictive** variable
- modeling the __process__ that produced the __pattern__
- examining the effects of **scale** 
- backdrops to show **context**
</div>

<div class="centerblock" style="margin-bottom:2em;"><img src="images/cholera_kernel_density.jpg"></img></div>

## Common tasks working with geospatial data

<div class="indented2 incremental"><div>
_Data Prep_

<div class="indented3 incremental">
 - Import and export
 - Convert between formats
 - Project
 - Edit attributes or spatial properties
 - Create new data
 - Query by attribute or spatial property
 - Join by attribute or spatial relationship (fuse)
 - Geocode
</div>
</div></div>

<div class="indented2 incremental"><div>
_Analysis_

<div class="indented3 incremental">
 - Measure geometric properties
    + length
    + area
    + perimeter
    + sinuosity
    + texture
 - Spatial stats
 - Interpolation
 - Geoprocessing
 - Compare (siting)
 - Spatial sampling
 - Scale dependency 
 - Classify
 - Model process (e.g., regression)
</div>
</div></div>

<div class="indented2 incremental"><div>
_Visualization_

<div class="indented3 incremental">
 - Cartography
 - Interactive
</div>
</div></div>
